title: A problem of Erd\H{o}s about rich distances
abstract:
An old question posed by Erd\H{o}s asked whether there exists a set of $n$
points such that $c \cdot n$ distances occur more than $n$ times. We provide an
affirmative answer to this question, showing that there exists a set of $n$
points such that $\lfloor \frac{n}{4}\rfloor$ distances occur more than $n$
times. We also present a generalized version, finding a set of $n$ points where
$c_m \cdot n$ distances occurring more than $n+m$ times.
